about_the_game:
Who Made This is a fun, light and easy-to-play click and point investigation game. Put your detective skills to the test by walking around the city and visiting various places, collecting the information you need to solve the cases.

In the game, you will have a map with several places to visit and in each place a character to interrogate. In each location, you can also investigate the scene by opening drawers, looking at surveillance cameras and even looking at the crime scene. Of course, each action you take will cost you time and the clock tells you how much time you have to find out who planned the crime. The more information you collect, the better, but the less time you will have in the future, so create your strategy, read the clues carefully and good luck! And most importantly, have fun!
